7427: Position 95: ILE (AS) (one (upper) prox tyr)
10,10 cat res rot
small extension in BP
good apo-holo match

7058: standard AS
25,20 cat res rot
double H-bond in dist Tyr pair
large extension in BP
some shrinkage in holo

8610: Position 112: VAL (AS) 
Position 30: TRP
Position 103: PHE
5,10 cat res rot
double H-bond in dist Tyr pair (potentially with W30)
small extension in BP
ILE 38 folds in when apo

9867: Position 55: PHE (AS) (one (front) dist tyr)
Position 7: LEU
0,20 cat res rot
good BP
TRP 58 folds in when apo

6816: Position 116: PHE (AS) (one (lower) prox tyr)
0,15 cat res rot
extension in BP
slight fold of TRP 58 apo-holo

8941:Position 112: PHE (AS) (double Hbond tyr pair)
Position 7: LEU, Position 121: PHE
0,20 cat res rot
great BP
PHE 63 and TRP58 fold holo-apo

Selected for cat res geometry, AS diversity, Hbonds and BP in this order
